term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - phase ratio, β, in chromatography
term.title: phase ratio

item.text: The ratio of the volume of the mobile phase to that of the stationary phase in a column: β = V0/Vs) is to be substituted for V 0.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 833 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
